int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int x;
        ll ans=0;
        ll odd=0,even=0;
        scanf("%d",&x);
        while(x--)
        {
            int y;
            scanf("%d",&y);
            if(y%2)
                odd++;
            else
                even++;
        }
        ans= odd*even+ (even*(even-1))/2;
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
 return 0;
}
